This very small shield is a favorite of duelists and quick, lightly armored warriors. It’s typically made of steel and strapped to your forearm. You can Raise a Shield with your buckler as long as you have that hand free or are holding a light object that’s not a weapon in that hand.

<title level="2">Specific Magic Shields</title>
[Duelist's Beacon](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1239), [Floating Shield](/Equipment.aspx?ID=319), [Glamorous Buckler](/Equipment.aspx?ID=734), [Reflecting Shield](/Equipment.aspx?ID=324), [Sapling Shield](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1860), [Silkspinner's Shield](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1245)

This large steel shield features a specialized opening to hold lances and similar weapons.
